Packaging

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”23px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Customized packaging of a wide selection of specialty”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”64px||4px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCI is a world pioneer in the manufacture of rigid and versatile packaging for minerals. Our minerals are used in a wide variety of items, from container boards, jumbo bags to plastic bags, filter coatings, sheets and film.

We provide a broad variety of packaging options, both in terms of ability and in terms of materials, to conform to your needs as much as possible. Our whole product collection is assembled in compliance with the strictest standards and strives to be as environmentally sustainable as possible.

We are actively looking for healthier and better packaging processes. We are an ISO 14001 accredited organization and environmental sustainability is one of the goals of the business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”3px||37px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Packaging-@-GMCI.jpg” alt=”GMCI Packaging” title_text=”GMCI Packaging” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/packaging-at-GMCI.jpg” alt=”GMCI Packaging” title_text=”GMCI Packaging” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”6px||45px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

BENEFITS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Broad selection of products taking into consideration the environmental stability and properties of our solvents and reagents.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Vacuum packaging for critical products (i.e. hydroscopic products)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Broad selection of sizes: simplicity and peace of mind for all our consumers worldwide.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • UN approval: labelling accepted in compliance with the new transport regulations.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Safe labelling solutions containers and caps intended to mitigate individual hazards to consumers and the climate.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Simple management with our customer’s day-to-day activities.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • We may stack our shipments in various styles of pallets: pallet wood, pallet plastic, pallet half, etc.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Packing can be done upon customer requirement also.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_image=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/sky-blue-texture-1-scaled.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.56)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”131px||131px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”130px||130px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”58px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”93%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||||false|true” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”38px” text_font_size_phone=”27px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Get more information

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.gmciltd.com/contact-us/” button_text=”CONTACT US” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#04484E” button_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#ffffff” button_border_radius=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”23px|||30px|false|false” custom_padding=”13px|32px|13px|32px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_width__hover=”1px” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
